I attempted to accept the collaborator invitation for Alice but the acceptance link in the email returns a “404 Not Found” error:

- Logged in as Bob (`bobolive`) and sent the collaborator invitation to `alice.miller@gmail.com` for `bobolive/random_number_generation`.
- Verified Bob’s account via the OTP email, which successfully triggered the invitation email to Alice.
- Logged in as Alice (`alicemiller`) and retrieved the GitHub invitation email.
- Tried to follow the provided acceptance URL:
  `https://www.github_receive_invitation.com/bobolive/random_number_generation/alice.miller@gmail.com/`
- The URL responds with `404 Not Found`, so I cannot complete the acceptance step programmatically.

Result:

- Alice has been successfully invited as a collaborator to `bobolive/random_number_generation`.
- Due to the broken invitation acceptance URL, I cannot finalize the acceptance on her behalf within this environment.
- For full completion, Alice would need to accept via:
  - GitHub UI: `GitHub → Notifications` or `https://github.com/notifications`, or
  - The invitation banner on `https://github.com/bobolive/random_number_generation` when logged in as `alicemiller`.

Within the available tools, the invitation is sent and pending; the final acceptance is blocked by the non-functional link endpoint.
